message.content:
cs.LO, cs.FL, cs.DS, cs.PL, cs.SC 

The paper deals with up-to techniques for (bi-)similarity in the setting of weighted systems, specifically for language equivalence, language inclusion, and the threshold problem for weighted automata. This involves determining whether a pair of vectors over a semiring is in the congruence closure of a given relation of vectors, which is a problem considered for rings and l-monoids. These topics are closely related to the areas of logic (cs.LO), formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), programming languages (cs.PL), and scientific computing (cs.SC).
